name: HexaWords
description:
HexaWords; a brand new game from Quattro Co., the creator of Logomania, popular game among millions.

Test yourself with hundreds of words. Keep hours of fun while challenging your mind! Drag letters and find the words, level up and compete on the leaderboard. The faster you find the words, the more points you earn and rise in the leaderboard.

Download now and Start the fun!
